data.persona: I am a person who belongs to an organization. We all belong, hence our membership. Without that, we'd just be people.
data.description:
You are in the The ritual room.
A room with a solid block stone in the middle with steps leading up to it. Candle stands surround the center with 4 candle holders on each stand. A red carpet leads to the steps to the center of the room.
There's a ritual dagger, a Candle, a red carpet, a holder, and a Tool here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I am completing a ritual process
data.mid_motivation: I want to make a request to the leader of the organization
data.long_motivation: I have to secure my interests and that of my family while I am a member of this organization
